beninging.1: I remember the online classes we had together, we were in lockdown and not everyone wanted to go out of their houses yet, I remember you sucked at reading and would read all wrong, it was so funny. I'm really proud of you now, you're even working on your accent to make it better.
beninging.2: This was the first time you came to our house, it was me you and Ramtin, you really wanted to play this new harry potter game and I was so excited that a girl was coming to our house for the first time! It was super fun and exciting, I also left you to go home on your own, I was so stupid back then...
beninging.4: Remember this Uni shirt? When I was making it I had tons of fun designing it for you, it was a great time. I haven't seen you wearing it for a long time.
beninging.8: You wanted to get rid of your orthodontics, after they were removed you were so glad. Your teeth looked real nice after it.
beninging.11: I loved this phone case you made me, it was done really well, I still have it and will keep it

whereItAllStarted.1: This was the night, I rejected you and regretted it, it could have been the end but I'm so glad it wasn't. I was so scared, I didn't know what to do at the time. We met each other after almost two months of no contact except the time I sent you the birthday video. I'm glad that we got to be together.
whereItAllStarted.2: This was the first night we had some time together, walking around and having fun, it was also the night you told me I was a BAD KISSER. WTF. At least now I'm one of the best kissers in the world I can guarantee that.
whereItAllStarted.5: We went and had pizza together, it tasted great with extra cream inside the dough, it was different but tasted great, also this picture we got together was amazing, I loved it then and I still love it so much now.
whereItAllStarted.6: We went to a cafe this day and I gave you a gift! Do you remember? You also gave me one, a kiss on the lips, it was our first one. I loved it.
whereItAllStarted.7: We went to the candy store that day and bought a bunch of tasty sweets, I kept the candy you chose for me and didn't eat it, one day when I was going to my desk I saw tons of ants crawling all over the candy and it shocked me, I ate it afterwards.

inThePark.1: We went to this park a lot together, I would come to you from work and we would walk there together, rest a bit, talk a bit more, kiss a lot more, and then we'd go home together with the subway, those were the times. I loved every moment of it.

onTheBridge.1: When we wanted to go home, this was the bridge we had to cross to reach the other side of the walking path to then get to the subway, it was a great idea to stay and take a bunch of pictures together, I love them all so much, you look so cute and pretty like in every other photo. I love you.

tastyFood.1: This was a really cool Korean restaurant that we went in, even though it was empty and no one was in it, the food was great, I had tons of fun with you and we thanked the staff before we left, it was great.

baklava.1: This cookie was supposed to be a tiny memory book, but I guess it was way too tasty and you ate it...
baklava.5: We went and ate some baklava here, it was SO GOOD, I even bought some big ones for home and they tasted amazing. Just like you.

cafeKetab.1: It was a really cold night, we went to this cafe and had latte and a cake, they tasted great and I didn't have any money that night so you paid for us instead. Thanks :D

doretBegardam.1: You were with me here and we played tons of games, this one was super fun and cute even though we didn't even get to reach a higher point in the game other than the tutorial. Damn.

rambod.1: We went to an amusement park inside a mall, I forgor which one, we played a lot of games and it was great. Also Rambod looks kinda gay ngl.

jerKhordim.1: This... this was the day we went for a bike ride, in the freezing cold and you with almost no experience riding a bike, we went the whole way from the start of Pasdaran to the middle, but in the end it was worth it, we ate something really tasty which I don't even remember its name. You did great and I'm sure it was also a great experience for you as well, just not for your butt and feet. Goboon buttet besham.

nose.1: I got some tasty moochi for us from the Abmive foorooshi, well I thought they were gonna be tasty, but they weren't really that good, the time I had with you was the best though, I enjoyed it a lot, we took the best pictures in the world and the Joojoo moochi was squashed, it looked so goofy, just like you.

vijioCawl.1: You need to call me a lot more than you did before, specially now that you're so far away, I miss you a lot.

damdaran.1: We went to an amusement park with Namdar that day, we played some VR games, one where we fell off a high building, one of them we were inside a cart which went through a horror mansion and in the end we fell inside a grave and it was game over. We also played some beat saber, that was great, I had an amazing time with you like I always did.
damdaran.8: I don't even know what these videos are about, do you?
damdaran.10: Just the two of us inside a tight and tiny space.

delishoos.1: We went and ate breakfast here together, these moments were rare when I could go out with you in the morning, I loved them, they felt different, they felt fresh, the food was also really good, I enjoyed it a lot.

harry_pottler.1: A harry potter themed cafe, with harry potter themed drinks and food, but lets be honest it was just the names, the food didn't resemble anything special, it was good though, we played backgammon board together and you taught me how to play and I beat you! You schupeeeeeeeeeeeeddddddd boooooooobieeeeeeeeeeee.

hulu_lost.1: I got some off time from work and waited for you at the park, you came there for me and we had lunch together, those moments were really special to me, I enjoyed all of it with you. Thanks.

humbududududum.1: We were 'training' together and working on your English, it was really fun, I took one of your tests and got a better score than you even after you've studied for months! It probably felt really bad for you but in the end, it was all worth it.
humbududududum.2: We went to this cafe a lot, once we didn't even buy anything other than a bottle of water and then we just left and went home.
humbududududum.5: You always look so goofy whenever we video call, I wished you called me more than you do now, I miss you a lot, this is the second time I'm telling you this. It also helps me understand you better, just talking with you helps a ton.
humbududududum.15: I loved holding you, it was like holding the softest and warmest pillow ever, there wasn't a feeling better than this.

my_birthday.1: You bought me the cutest cake ever, I loved it, even though it was small and tiny like you, it tasted amazing and was really thoughtful of you I enjoyed it a lot, also the gift you gave me was amazing as well, I always wanted a lava lamp, even though now its just a red water lamp but I still use it sometimes.
my_birthday.6: I loved this color of your hair, it was special and you never colored it like this again, it was just this once and you looked so sexy and cool, you also kind of looked like Johnny Cage from Mortal Kombat.
my_birthday.9: This was the time Dudu still liked you, what even happened?????

hulu_perperi.1: You were feeling down this day, I don't really remember what was that made you feel so bad but I had my Nintendo DS with me, we took some pictures with it, they were so funny, we also ate Lasagna, it tasted great. You love lasagna so much, but I love you more.

khojel.1: Just having phun together, do you remember what we did that day? Cuz I don't, I love your music taste honestly.
khojel.2: You came with me to the hospital, they can't find my veins, the needles hurt, WHY, WHYYYYYYYY
khojel.6: I love how you look with eyeliner, you look so sexy omg. I love you.

chingchangchung.1: What was this pot called? big boobie pot? because it tasted like big boobies, plus some eggs on the side. IT WAS SO EXPENSIVE, but worth it for just one time and it tasted kind of fun as well.
chingchangchung.2: The chicken though... oh man, that was the best.
chingchangchung.3: Hulu? Hulu kuchulu gooogooloo bubulu dodoloo shooshooloo joogooloo

joogool.4: We had tons of fun, this is the Fekr Kade near our house we had our fun, I love our moments together.
